en: This test server is in maintenance now. As a server owner, you can edit this text to tell the player how long this will last, and what reason is behind it.
zh: 该测试服目前正在维护中。 作为服务器所有者，您可以编辑此文本来告诉玩家这将持续多久，以及其背后的原因。
sm_en: Connected to the test server. To disable this message, edit OverRide/maintenance.json.
sm_zh: 测试服已连接。 要禁用此消息，请编辑 OverRide/maintenance.json。
